    (package private) void doGenerateTable​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
    This is a function to generate Table, it will do input validation check for input date and selected countries.
    (package private) void doPickDate​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
    This function is to pick the date of interest and create a list of countries option for the user to select.
    (package private) void doShowTop3​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
    This funciton is to generate a Table with top 3 entries in total death on particular date.
    (package private) void doShowTop3_1M​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
    This funciton is to generate a Table with top 3 entries in total death per 1M on particular date.

    This function is to switch the bottom scroll bar into console.

    • generateB1Record

      public comp3111.covid.B1Record generateB1Record​(java.lang.String dataset, java.lang.String location, java.time.LocalDate dateOfInterest)
      This function is to generate a record in a table with a desired location, date, and dataset.
      Parameters:
      dataset -
      location -
      dateOfInterest -
      Returns:
      a B1Record which consists of Country name, Total Death, Total Death per 1M on the date of interest.

    • generateB1RecordWithTop3

      public java.util.ArrayList<comp3111.covid.B1Record> generateB1RecordWithTop3​(java.lang.String dataset, java.time.LocalDate dateOfInterest)
      This function is to generate a list of records that having the top 3 total death on the date of interest. If one of the data is missing, it will not be considered as a valid record even if it is the top 3.
      Parameters:
      dataset -
      dateOfInterest -
      Returns:
      a list of B1Records

    • generateB1RecordWithTop3_1M

      public java.util.ArrayList<comp3111.covid.B1Record> generateB1RecordWithTop3_1M​(java.lang.String dataset, java.time.LocalDate dateOfInterest)
      This function is to generate a list of records that having the top 3 total death per 1M on the date of interest. If one of the data is missing, it will not be considered as a valid record even if it is the top 3.
      Parameters:
      dataset -
      dateOfInterest -
      Returns:
